summary: Experienced Product Specialist in the international luxury travel and leisure industry with wide knowledge of luxury destinations and hotels. Skilled in sales, marketing, product and data load with an expertise in price match. Well-developed communication and negotiation skills to build long-term relationships. A strong commercial focus with a will to win. Dedicated, enthusiastic and curious, with a hands on mentality. Has a Bachelor in Tourism & Leisure Management at Breda University of Applied Science.

education.field_of_study: Management Tourism, differentiation Management Outgoing Tourism Organization and Tour Operating
Dutch, English, German 1 & 2, history, mathematics a1, economics 1, biology, art

profile_positions.description:
The Senior Product Specialist assists and supports the product team (Amsterdam and London) with their portfolio of approx. 375+ luxury hotels located in sought after leisure destinations across the globe. Furthermore, is the Senior Product Specialist responsible for all price match queries (high level and expertise/specialism) and finding ways to maximize and improve sales results on a daily basis.

Principal accountabilities
- Price match queries for the entire portfolio, for all kind of destinations and booking channels
- Assist Product Managers with day to day tasks i.e. problem solving, negotiations, research/analysis, contract queries and offers, instructions for the loading team, marketing - approx. 375+ luxury hotels in various destination with an expertise in UAE and Oman, Indian Ocean and Europe (Spain and Greece)
- Help reservations to win bookings with competitive pricing and problem solving
- Bench mark
- Increase profitability 
- Monthly room night analysis
- Ad-hoc calculations, invoice queries and pricing for marketing mailings
- Supervise and train marketing and communication students during their internship
- Brochure production; text changes, styling and pricing
- Content creation and owning for internal and external websites (for example hotel information, room descriptions and images for the online booking tool), as well as, create monthly (+bi-monthly) marketing campaigns on social media like Facebook
- Create specific travel programmes and needed hotel information for reservations
- Take care of travel agent rates, staff stays and incentives
- Organize product trainings

Since November 2021 is Travel Impressions owned by Hyatt Hotels Corporation
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Specialist Travel Impressions

profile_positions.title: Product Specialist American Express Vacations EMEA

profile_positions.description:
The Assistant Business Development Manager assists the product and marketing team (Amsterdam and London) with analysing the market behaviour and taking care of marketing.

Principal accountabilities
- Analyse all bookings per market (+15 markets), hotel (approx. 375+) and destination
- Help create powerpoint presentations for team and management meetings reflecting the analyzed results
- Monthly room night analysis
- Create a monthly (+bi-monthly) marketing campaign for the internal website
- Responsible for the family programme including the needed information to help reservations
- Take care of agent rates and incentives
profile_positions.title: Assistant Business Development Manager American Express Vacations EMEA

profile_positions.description: Starting position with a role under development - taking over the hotel contract loading (approx. 375+) from American Express India. Build and create new work routines, planning and strategies to translate and load hotel contracts and offers into a booking system to make sure reservations can make their bookings correctly. All contracts differ from each other and therefore all need a different approach. This involves a lot of problem solving (booking, system and rate related). In addition, the growth of interest to assist the product department and therefore started to assist with price match queries, various analysis, brochure production and providing agents with information regarding offers and terms & conditions.
profile_positions.title: Dataload / Assistant Product Department American Express Vacations EMEA
